description: Take on the trail with the Timp 3. The Quantic™, high-cushion midsole is designed for high-intensity trail days. The perfect road-to-trail shoe, the Timp 3 features an engineered mesh upper and the MaxTrac™ outsole brings max traction to the trail. Get ready for serious performance with a comfort level your feet will thank you for, even after miles and miles of dirt days and long, hard road runs. It’s Timp time - are you ready?
name: Altra Timp 3 - Mens
